roleset.name: to push through, make your way with force like a bull

role.descr: Entity in motion, moving like a bull
Entity pushed through, past by arg1, the way of arg1

example.name: Sports talk?
example.text: In between losses to Silva, the Franklin of old emerged, as he bulled his way to a win over Jason MacDonald
example.arg: to a win over Jason MacDonald

roleset.note: BULL-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel expansion of VerbNet, PropBank, and sense groupings. Framed by Claire. (from bull.01-v)
